scripts.demo-static:dev: pnpm core:build && pnpm -F demo-static run dev
scripts.demo-static:build: pnpm core:build && pnpm -F demo-static run build
scripts.demo-server:dev: pnpm core:build && pnpm -F demo-server run dev
scripts.demo-server:start: pnpm core:build && pnpm demo-server:build && pnpm -F demo-server run start
